[color=#FFFFE0][b]Hack Forums. Trademarked or not?[/b][/color]
On October the 22th our administrator [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] replied to a thread regarding the question alot of people have been asking themselves for quite some time. Is Hack Forums a registered trademark or not?
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] replied to this saying "We are not a registered trademark with USPTO but that's not required in order to actually have a legal trademark. The same is true for copyright. ".  [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5440165]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[list]
[*] [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=438034][color=white][b]Top Hat And Monocle.[/b][/color][/url] is a [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=86] Great thinker[/url]. 
[*] [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2682887][color=white][b]Mr. Robot[/b][/color][/url] received the [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=39] Purple Clover[/url] award.
[*] [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1398948][color=white][b]Secret Agent[/b][/color][/url] received the [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=86] Purple Clover[/url] award.

[size=x-small]* = prior to the Friday of release![/size]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/NotableThreads/Vossen.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5431584][b]Rate Limit and Traffic Control[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#FF66FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url]
As we are informed, Hack Forums is now part of the beta for Cloudflare's "Traffic Control" feature. Due to certain restrictions Hack Forums now has due to this feature, it is best to read over the thread and understand the use of this feature. [/list]

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5435553][b][TUT] How to setup METROHTTP Botnet in 20 minutes[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1698590][b][color=#99FF00]khalsahn[/color][/b][/url]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1698590][b][color=#99FF00]khalsahn[/color][/b][/url] teaches us a detailed and very simple tutorial in regards to setting up an METROHTTP Botnet in [i]20[/i] minutes. [/list]

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5435359][b]Free online IP cams (let's find some entertaining, cool shit, together!)[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1522601][b][color=#0099FF]ZuGgY[/color][/b][/url]
In this entertaining thread, Hack Forums users gather together to share live IP cams and discuss your findings on current websites listed in the thread, or of links found within your own research

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5441356][b]Worst thing you did in school?H[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1118895][b][color=#99FF00]Extirpate[/color][/b][/url]
Share and discuss the worse things you and other Hack Forums users have done in school. Quite the entertaining thread with all the submissions![/list]

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5434785][b]This is the end... my one and only friend, the end.[/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#383838][b]Roger Waters[/color][/b][/url]
So long and farewell to the user [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][b][color=#383838]Roger Waters[/color][/b][/url] as he resigns from Hack Forums and continues on with his personal life.[/list]

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5434313][b]Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare Contest Xbox One,PS4,PC[/b][/url] - [url=hhttps://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2360425][b]Famous Hater[/b][/url]
Win a free copy of Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare for either PC, Xbox One, or PS4 simply by posting on [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2360425][b]Famous Hater[/b][/url][b]'s[/b] giveaway thread.
[/list]

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b]
[list]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5410576][b]Broken Jaw [Update 19 @10/1/16] + Picture(s)[/b][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2177496][b][color=#0099FF]boxxy[/color][/b][/url]
Unfortunately, a member of Hack Forums was jumped which resulted in a broken jaw. Find out more details along with pictures with the thread listed above.[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/ScienceNews/ryand8_SN.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Takes Three to Tango[/color][/b]
The first child with the mitochondrial DNA from three separate individuals (a man and two women) was born on 28 Sept 2016. The baby was born through a process where in vitro fertilization was used to take the "DNA from the nucleus of the mother's egg cells and inserted that genetic material into the egg cells from the donor." The mother's eggs contained faulty mitochondria which led to problems conceiving, so they took the egg of a donor, replacing it with the mother's allowing them to alter the DNA in a way that has never been done before. Altering DNA at this level leads to a debate on the morality and safety in performing these types of practices as it's unclear what the future of these eggs hold. This could shape the future of fertilization as we may be able to not only choose the gender, but specific traits; eye color, height, and weight.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.livescience.com/56299-three-person-baby-created.html] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Kamehameha 2.0[/color][/b]
NASA's Hubble Space Telescope has detected a large, extremely hot globes of gas flying through space. These super hot balls of gas are each twice the size of Mars and are reaching speeds of up to 500,000 mph, fast enough to travel from the Earth to the Moon in less than 30 minutes. While the exact origin of these globes is not exactly known. The globes have been proven to be unrelated to it's neighboring star. More observations are being done to uncover the truth behind these mysterious balls of gas.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2016/10/161006133031.htm] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Smell You Later Cartilage Hater[/color][/b]
Did you go for a slider that didn't work out? Maybe you tried parkour and didn't do to well. According to researchers at the University of Basel, you are able to use nasal cartilage cells to not only aid, but repair joints altogether. The University has taken the cells and grown them into cartilage grafts thus becoming a "repair patch" for your knee. Studies have shown that two years after surgery there is a drastic improvement to knee function, quality of life and pain. There are still more trials that need to take place, but if you have a bum knee, keep your nose handy. You might need it![i][size=x-small][url=https://www.sciencenews.org/blog/science-ticker/nose-cells-fix-knee-cartilage-human-trial] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=left]
[url=http://www.theverge.com/games/2016/10/20/13342308/nintendo-switch-nx-console-reveal-video-trailer-release][b]Nintendo Reveals Next Gen Console, the Nintendo Switch[/b][/url]
After over a year of fans hearing about the Nintendo NX: the rumored successor to the Wii U, Nintendo has finally unveiled what will become their next-gen console. Now named the Nintendo Switch, the console is a mix of portable handheld and home console, with a screen that can come apart from the console, and have ‚Äúhandles‚Äù with controller buttons to play on the go. Along with this, normal looking controllers are shown being used with it, for those looking for more than handheld gaming. What may surprise some, is the sight of Skyrim and NBA 2K17 and other third party games shown in the trailer, hinting that Nintendo may some serious third party support this time around. Along with trying to get developers behind them, the inclusion of a scene where the Switch is being used in an eSports arena shows that Nintendo is finally paying attention to the competitive gaming scene. No specific date has been given for release, but the console is set to launch in March.

[url=http://www.theverge.com/2016/10/14/13288978/samsung-galaxy-note-7-flight-ban-faa-us][b]Samsung Galaxy Note 7 Banned from all U.S. Flights[/b][/url]
Still cleaning up after a horrendous quality control nightmare, Korean tech giant Samsung‚Äôs now infamous Galaxy Note 7 smartphone, is seeing its first official ban in the states. Coming straight from the FAA (Federal Aviation Administration) and Pipeline & Haz-Mat Safety branch of the Department of Transportation, the Note 7 has been officially banned from all U.S. airline flights. This comes after a string of reports of Galaxy Note 7 phones spontaneously catching fire and even exploding, with one such event happening on a Southwest Airlines flight not long ago. No specifics on enforcing the ban has been addressed, but the FAA restriction claims that an individual who brings a Samsung Galaxy Note 7 onto an aircraft may be "subject to civil penalties of up to $179,933 for each violation for each day they are found to be in violation (49 U.S.C. 5123)," and may even face jail time.

[url=http://www.pcworld.com/article/3133847/internet/ddos-attack-on-dyn-knocks-spotify-twitter-github-etsy-and-more-offline.html][b]Dyn DNS Hit by Massive DDoS Attack, Knocking Down Many Huge Sites[/b][/url]
If you‚Äôve been on the internet this Friday, you may have witnessed firsthand what may be one of the largest scale attacks in recent memory. A DDoS attack on Dyn DNS resulted in insanely popular pages such as Twitter, Github, the PlayStation Network, PayPal, Spotify, and many more going down in many places for almost the entire afternoon. According to Dale Drew, a Chief Security Officer for a backbone provider that was attacked ‚Äì the botnet responsible for this attack was the same IoT botnet going by ‚ÄúMirai‚Äù that was used earlier this month to attack sites with Tbps DDoS attacks. Even more surprising enough, the attack on Dyn DNS was reportedly done with only ten percent of Mirai‚Äôs botnet nodes. As of Friday night, all affected sites are back to normal.

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews.png[/img][/align]
[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/nintendo-switch-everything-you-need-to-know/1100-6444673/][color=white]The Nintendo Switch is Upon Us! [/color][/url][/b]
Nintendo has finally revealed its latest console: the Switch! There is a lot of information circulating around the web, but I've compiled the most important information that you need to know about it. Nintendo Switch is a hybrid device designed to operate as both a home console and a handheld device. The Switch console is a tablet-like screen with two detachable "Joy-Con" controllers that slide into place at its sides. The two ways to play the console are as follows. You can play it at home as a console by inserting the Switch into a docking station that allows it to be played on your television. The Joy-Con controllers can be used wirelessly or they can be attached to a grip accessory for a more traditional controller experience. Nintendo will be releasing a Switch Pro controller, but it will probably be sold separately. Most interestingly, the Switch can also be played as a handheld device! You can eject the Switch from the docking station and take it wherever you go. The Joy-Con controllers are attached directly to the sides of the screen, making it resemble a Wii U gamepad that can function on its own.

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/red-dead-redemption-2-ps4-players-will-have-first-/1100-6444646/][color=white]Red Dead Redemption 2 Confirmed [/color][/url][/b]
As expected earlier this week, Rockstar Games has confirmed the existence of Red Dead Redemption 2! The announcement [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmA6MrX81z4]trailer[/url] was released on October 20, but no story details were provided. However, we did get some other interesting news regarding Red Dead Redemption 2. Due to their partnership with Sony, PS4 players will have early access to content. Sony's vice president of PlayStation Brand Marketing, John Koller, said Red Dead Redemption 2 is "handcrafted to take full advantage of the PS4" and promised "more details soon" on the exclusive access PS4 players will have in the game. Story details haven't been released, but there are some hints which came in the form of a narrator that sounds a lot like Dutch van der Linde, the character Marston is pursuing in Redemption. If it happens to be Dutch van der Linde, Red Dead Redemption 2 will be closely linked to the first game. Not much is currently known, but the game looks impressive as it is. Stay tuned for more details! I'll provide them as they become available.
